new.name: CVE-2017-7529
new.description: Nginx versions since 0.5.6 up to and including 1.13.2 are vulnerable to integer overflow vulnerability in nginx range filter module resulting into leak of potentially sensitive information triggered by specially crafted request.

new.name: Remote-Integer-Overflow-Vulnerability
new.description: Added Vulnerability Code in Python for Nginx Vulnerability (CVE-2017-7529)

new.name: nginx-overflow
new.description: Scans for nginx integer overflow vulnerability (CVE-2017-7529)

new.description: Exploit for NGiX 1.6.2 Remote Integer Overflow Vulnerability CVE-2017-7529

new.name: Cve_Finder_2017-7529
new.description: The tool is used to detect whether a server is vulnerable to Nginx Remote Integer Overflow CVE (2017-7529)

new.name: Serein
new.description: 【懒人神器】一款图形化、批量采集url、批量对采集的url进行各种nday检测的工具。可用于src挖掘、cnvd挖掘、0day利用、打造自己的武器库等场景。可以批量利用Actively Exploited Atlassian Confluence 0Day CVE-2022-26134和DedeCMS v5.7.87 SQL注入 CVE-2022-23337。

new.name: Log4j-Vulnerability-in-Ghidra-tool-CVE-2021-44228
new.description: Remote Code Execution attacks are one of the most frequent methods employed by cybercriminals to compromise susceptible computers. In the previous year, a serious zero-day vulnerability was identified in Log4j, a java program used by developers for debugging and application modification loggings. This is also a significant vulnerability that affects the so-called Ghidra reverse engineering tool.

new.name: log4j-scan
new.description: A fully automated, accurate, and extensive scanner for finding log4j RCE CVE-2021-44228
